name: Concept Definition
description: Defines the initial concept and project objectives.

name: Feasibility Analysis
description: Evaluates the technical and business feasibility of the proposed solution.

name: System Design
description: Specifies architecture; modules; and integration plans.

name: Implementation
description: Handles development, code integration, and feature rollout.

name: Validation & Testing
description: Ensures quality through test cases, reviews, and performance checks.

name: Deployment
description: Manages release preparation and transition to production environment.

name: Decommissioning
description: Focuses on system retirement, data archiving, and project closure.
